long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a plugin wallet for the Xrpinals blockchain, you can use this plugin wallet to make transfers from the
Layer1 of the Bitcoin chain to Layer2 of the Xrpinals chain, as well as transfers on Layer2, and withdrawals to Layer1.
You can use this plugin wallet to transfer funds from Layer1 of the Bitcoin chain to Layer2 of the Xrpinals chain, transfer funds from Layer2, and withdraw funds from Layer1.
It is even possible to call a series of contracts on Layer2 to complete a variety of financial products, and financial derivatives, such as Defi or three-way contract.
For example, Defi or three-party contract, mortgage and a series of financial services.
Hope you like this product and enjoy it!
